pages.text: The first thought of any practitioner who starts working with silver is 'can it be crafted into more effective undead-slaying weaponry?' The answer - yes, undoubtedly. Adorned with $(l:components/cursed_gold)cursed gold$() and featuring a blade of $(l:components/silver)pure silver$(), this weapon inflicts increased damage against undead and weakens monsters by reducing their movement speed, ensuring success in any battle for the stiletto wielder.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The stiletto is one of the few artifacts that is not purely magical. The crafting process is extremely simple and accessible to anyone with a suitable workspace, a small supply of silver, and perhaps some spare cursed gold available.
